name: LightView
description:
YOU WILL NEED TO PRESS "M" TO QUIT THE GAME ! REMEMBER ! (normally)

Game for the Brackeys Game Jam !

You are somebody who fell into a strange world without any light ! But You have a Power ! You can switch a light and look around you but you can't move when your light is on... You will need to go to the "fire" on the egg (it look like so....) and go to the next level ! This game is really hard (I think !) 5 levels wich are really hard !

The world is a swamp ! Don't fall in the water !

Thanks to YSENGE for the music

It's a .app game made on a mac... Get in 720 to be sure to play and in windowed !
